 I say for the election we have a debate. I know I'm not on the 
Council, but I think the rules should be:
1. Anyone NOT running for Council (that includes those already 
elected) can ask a cantidate any question NOT concerning his life off 
the computer or in other rpgs.
2. No cantidate may question ANYTHING of another cantidate, although 
he may use replies of others to attack them in his campaign.
3. Anyone elected who then goes back on his word will be removed from 
the council.

Let me start:

Nemasis, I don't mean to sound like I'm attacking you, but at an 
earlier date you said that Shadow Star doesn't exist because he goes 
against your idea of Transformer physics although no one agreed with 
you and he has been accepted into the game. Would you be out for 
revenge looking for any reason to ban me for this? (I thought and I 
thought but I couldn't come up with a less rude way to put it, I just 
think I've learned my lesson and don't want a guy on the council 
banning me for breathing)
